name: UMMAH EDUCATIONAL AND WELFARE TRUST
briefDescription: Ummah Educational & Welfare Trust is a registered non profitable charitable established with a great thought and vision for upliftment of the downtrodden, educationally backward & weaker section of the society.The trust “Ummah Educational & Welfare Trust” bearing registration no. 503/1628 (Indian Trust Act) came into existence in the year 2001 under the guidance of great scholar & educationist of India HazratMaulana Gulam Mohammed Wastanvi Sahab - Director & Rector of Jamia Ishatul Uloom, Akkalkua, Maharastra & with the kind cooperation of great social worker & humanitarian Hazi Haroon Aziz Sahabwith the objectives to uplift the Ummah educationally, economically, socially & morally
